$ curl 'https://dev.finpo.kr/user/me' -i -X PUT \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..6MpaGySeNEQhAtClpHdqV6wnq7A7TAfpevHYz9ZTQ8Bg7LdZo6H9jsyNIexjhiYYQRxZYDw7hPplVOb1Zap0mA' \
    -d '{
  "regionId" : 3,
  "nickname" : "mason",
  "birth" : "1999-12-12"
}'
